column4: in system-admin i have 2 printing menu items...how do i remove one?
right click the menu bar, then select edit
thanks
no option to delete one
do you see two?
yes
just uncheck one
how? i see no option to do that
navigate to the admin menu, and uncheck the box in the right pane next to one of the printing thingo's
i would...but theres nothing to uncheck/select...just the tab and options to add it to desktop/panel
right click the menu bar itself, and there's an option
i go to system-admin-printing-right click....only optionsavailable are to add launcher  to desktop, panel or add drawer/menu to panel...no removal facilities shown at all..this is confusing me
im on hardy heron btw
no, without opening any menu, right click right on top of 'Applications'
aha...i see it ....
and now you're gonna see all the stuff the dev's didn't think you needed to se ;)
i got it sorted now....great....though a little confusing :)
thanks dude
for what its worth, in my opinion i think that option would have been better put under system tab as its to do with altering stuff under the hood so to speak...thanks for your help :)
yeah, it could be more obvious. Take it as a reminder that nearly everything you can't find anywhere else is probably under right click :)
noted
